summary: Uma and Sevvi Graa twin orc companions
descriptionHtml:
Adult mod..Uma and Sevi are both level 40 companions. Uma is a mage with many spells and Sevi uses two handed and one handed and is good at archery. Both are naked and have no weapons so you can equip them with what you wan . They can be found in Riverwood Trader

This is first mod be kind if you want if you don\'t thats ok to. This is very basic companions no extra files included

Required body
 CHSBHC BODY BY CHERRYHOLDING http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888
Amazing Smooth Females Complete by Zalzama http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/140 only female face file

TO EVERYONE HAVING PROBLEMS I FORGOT I HAD THIS MOD INSTALLED A WHILE AGO
Better Females by Bella by BellaGail http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
JUST THE MAIN FILE

I have very little knowledge using ck I tried finding directions on adding custom hair or other things if any knows where to find these thing can you let me know

Added New look file uder optional has both level up with and level 45 files inside
need this to work
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 FEMALE HAIR FILE
Updated new look file under optional should be correct look in pictures now bug with sevi level 50 file I cant get it to be that level even though it shows it in editor
author: mylittleduck
